import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Card, Button, CardDeck } from "react-bootstrap"; import CloudUploadIcon from "@material-ui/icons/CloudUpload"; import axios from "axios"; class Cards extends Component { handleselectedFile = event => { this.setState({ selectedFile: event.target.files[0], loaded: 100 }); }; handleUpload = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log("uploaded"); let data = new FormData(); data.append("file", this.state.selectedFile, this.state.selectedFile.name); data.append("name", this.state.selectedFile.name); axios .post("http://192.168.1.20:5000/upload?filetype=", data, { onUploadProgress: ProgressEvent => { this.setState({ loaded: (ProgressEvent.loaded / ProgressEvent.total) * 100 }); } }) .then(res => { console.log(res.statusText); }); }; handleDownload = () => {}; state = {}; render() { return (
